https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fR0VZ0VE598zl1lrYf7IfBqEwQ2.jpg In 1984, a young programmer begins to question reality as he adapts a dark fantasy novel into a video game. A mind-bending tale with multiple endings. Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
